title: How to prepare for the public service commission exams - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually state public service commission exams consist of reasoning, maths, science and general knowledge, History, geography etc. However, these exams required strong in basics of the respective subjects. So, the NCERT books are very much helpful in this regard. Even, the class 7–10 the books also help you. Further, you must be aware of the state where you reside. Please note that, these public service commission exams are not frequently conducted unlike UPSC exams.
